qa.name: Stitchy
qa.appearance: Well-worn teddy bear with a patch on one ear

hf.name: Whiskers
hf.appearance: Orange tabby cat with bright yellow eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: Every step brought Stitchy closer to the warmth of home.
json_to_edit.description: Stitchy the stuffed bear embarks on a journey to find his way back home, aided by Whiskers the stray cat.
json_to_edit.lighting: Varying from bright daylight to soft evening glow
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: City noises, rustling leaves, distant traffic
json_to_edit.name: Stitchy's Homeward Journey
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A forgotten stuffed bear named Stitchy tries to find his way back home, facing various obstacles and receiving help from Whiskers, a stray cat.

qa.action: Stitchy sitting alone on a park bench, looking lost and forlorn.

hf.action: Whiskers approaches Stitchy, meowing curiously and sniffing the stuffed bear.

tr.action: Stitchy's button eyes light up as Whiskers rubs against him, forming a new friendship.

xc.action: Stitchy and Whiskers navigate through busy city streets, dodging pedestrians.

ka.action: The duo encounters a large dog, with Whiskers bravely standing between it and Stitchy.

fn.action: Stitchy and Whiskers pass through a playground, reminding Stitchy of his young owner.

af.action: Stitchy recognizes a familiar street and perks up, quickening his pace.

qo.sfx_keywords: door creaking open, child's gasp of delight
qo.action: Stitchy is reunited with his owner, who scoops him up in a warm embrace.

edit_command: Add a new shot before each existing shot, but don't change anything else in the scene.

label.rationale: we will add a new shot before each existing shot in the scene, effectively doubling the number of shots from 8 to 16. this will provide more detail and pacing to stitchy's journey. we'll create new shots that complement and lead into the existing ones, maintaining the flow of the story. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field and add new entries to the "shots" dictionary, adjusting the "list_display_order" accordingly. the new shots will be creative and consistent with the scene's context and mood.
